summary: Installing required dependencies and libraries for pybrisque Python package, including libsvm-dev, pip3 installing pybrisque, alternative options provided for faster installation.

details.comment: Installing required dependencies and libraries for pybrisque Python package, including libsvm-dev, pip3 installing pybrisque, alternative options provided for faster installation.
details.content:
apt-get install libsvm-dev
pip3 install pybrisque
# pip3 install --process-dependency-links pybrisque
pip3 install git+https://github.com/Salinger/libsvm-python.git
# which is faster?
